Hello everybody,

We are getting more and more difficulties to crawl partic=
ular hosts of
the domain parti-socialiste.fr. After getting the host's DNS,=
 the
crawler blocks with "IOException: mark/reset not supported" (see
below=
). The error is the same with 1.10.1 and 1.12.0., jre is
1.5.0_06-b05.

The=
 problem began to occur a few days ago. So I guess they changed
something o=
n their servers that Heritrix cannot handle anymore. What
can I do?

Thanks=
 for help,
  Bert
